title: Critical: yay/paru Compatibility Issue with libalpm v16
content:
IMPORTANT: A recent pacman update upgraded libalpm from version 15 to 16, which can cause yay and paru AUR helpers to fail until they are updated.

**Impact:**
- Package updates and installations via yay/paru may fail
- This affects all Arch Linux users relying on these AUR helpers

**Resolution:**
- Update yay: The latest yay release is compatible. Update via: `pacman -Syu` then rebuild from AUR if needed
- Update paru: Ensure you're running the latest version compatible with libalpm v16

**Why this matters for Pacsea users:**
Since Pacsea integrates with AUR helpers, this compatibility issue directly affects package management functionality. Make sure your AUR helpers are up-to-date to avoid update failures.

**Source:** https://www.reddit.com/r/archlinux/comments/1plnucq/psa_yay_paru_updates_may_fail/

**Note:** Avoid workarounds like linking older libalpm versions, as these are not proper solutions and may cause further issues.
